bg-color.description: Applies specified color to the control’s background. Used on components that also support the color prop. - supports utility colors (for example success or purple) or css color (#033 or rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)). Find a list of built-in classes on the colors page

color.description: 指定控件颜色，颜色值可以是任意 Material 颜色（例如 success 或者 purple ）也可以是 Css 颜色 （例如 #033 或者 rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)）。在 颜色页中可以找到内置的颜色类列表。

disabled.description: Puts all children components into a disabled state

eager.description: Forces the component’s content to render when it mounts. This is useful if you have content that will not be rendered in the DOM that you want crawled for SEO.

elevation.description: 组件的海拔可接受 0 到 24 之间的值。你可以在 elevation page浏览更多信息。

readonly.description: 使整个扩展面板为只读。

rounded.description: 对指定的组件应用 border-radius 样式。您可以在 边框的圆角半径页面获取更多有关信息

selected-class.description: 配置被选中项目时应用的 CSS 类名。

tag.description: 指定在根元素上使用的自定义标签。

value.description: 控制内容的 打开/关闭 状态

events.name: group:selected
events.description: Event that is emitted when an item is selected within a group.
